Package kchandra423.kImages

Package of classes to draw a wide variety of Images, as well as provide clean and fast resizing methods.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    KImage
    A basic class for representing an Image.
    Scalable
    Defines a set of methods that any Scalable image should have; scaling and resizing, as well as the ability to get their current width and height.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    KImageBuilder
    Defines a way to create KImages based on their path name, as they cannot be directly instantiated.

Package kchandra423.kImages Description

Package of classes to draw a wide variety of Images, as well as provide clean and fast resizing methods. It is highly recommended to at least skim through the documentation of Scalr, GifDecoder, and Java Advanced Imaging to get a basic idea of how this package works. It should be noted that while these classes are generally pretty fast, they are not very memory efficient.
See Also:
Scalr, GifDecoder
